alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 3:49PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Routt County through 415 PM MDT... At 348 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles southwest of Hog Park Campground, or 35 miles northeast of Craig, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Routt County, including the following locations... Hahns Peak and Clark. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Upper Yampa River Basin
